Uses of Interface
com.petpet.c3po.api.dao.PersistenceLayer

Packages that use PersistenceLayer
com.petpet.c3po.analysis This package contains helper classes and components for doing analysis and aggregations of the data stored within C3PO. 
com.petpet.c3po.controller This package contains the persistence layer implementations. 
com.petpet.c3po.dao This package contains controller classes that tie the whole processing workflow together. 
com.petpet.c3po.dao.mongo This package contains all classes needed for the Mongo Persistence Layer. 
com.petpet.c3po.utils This package contains some CLI utility classes.

Classes in com.petpet.c3po.dao that implement PersistenceLayer
 class DefaultPersistenceLayer
          This default persistence layer just wraps a real implementation and is used by the Configurator if no persistence is specified.
